message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper presents a system for generating full-body renderings of a person for varying body pose and camera position. The system uses deep learning approaches and explicitly estimates a two-dimensional texture map of the model surface. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the Computer Vision (cs.CV) and Graphics (cs.GR) sub-categories. Additionally, the system is trained on videos annotated with 3D poses and foreground masks, indicating a possible use of machine learning techniques such as deep neural networks (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM). Finally, the paper also mentions the system's ability to achieve better generalization, which suggests a possible application of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques.
